iati-activity.description: The objective is to promote sustainable customs modernisation through implementation of the WCO framework of Stadards to Secure and Facilitate Global Trade (SAFE) by developing an effective, professional and transparent customs service capable of achieving an appropriate balance between the collection of satisfactory revenue, protection from illicit activity and facilitating trade.

iati-activity.title: AU Charter on the Rights and Welfare of the Child-Plan /Save the Children Swden Promoting ACRWC
iati-activity.description: This support is related to a proposal submitted by Plan Sweden, together with Save the Children Sweden and coalition of NGOs active in Africa. The main objective of the support is to improve the lives of children in Africa as per the provisions of ACRWC by enhancing the capacity of AU Organs, AU Committee of Experts on ACRWC and of CSOs to engage with the AUC and its organs on child rights issues.

iati-activity.title: KAIPTC, Bridging 2009-2011-KAIPTC
iati-activity.description: KAIPTC is an official Regional Peacekeeping Centre for ECOWAS.It has become West Africa's operational level focus institute for conflict prevention and peace and security studies. It delivers courses to military and civilian personnel involved in Peace Support Operations throughout the world, and leads original and challenging research into the causes and subsequent management of conflict.

Small, urgent and catalytic interventions are managed in response to financial sector vulnerabilities (primarily identified via the WB/IMF FSAP toolkit). As such, FIRST complement longer term bilateral work for financial stability.

iati-activity.title: AU P&S Dept 2008
iati-activity.description: The overall objective of the support is to contribute to a more peaceful Africa. This will be achieved through support to the AU Peace and Security Department within three lines of action: 1) a coordinated approach to post-conflict reconstruction and peace-building (5 MSEK), 2) strengthening of field missions (4 MSEK), and 3) small arms and light weapons (1 MSEK).

De fem tematiska områden som valts ut för PAU är a) grundläggande vetenskap, b) Jord-och livsvetenskap, c) Samhällsvetenskap, d) Rymdvetenskap, och e) Energi, vatten och klimatförändringar. Sida kommer att stödja samhällsveteskapliga nav.

iati-activity.title: Mount Elgon Cons (LVBC)
iati-activity.description: The aim of MERECP is to enhance the conservation status and benefits of Mt Elgon ecosystem for environment quality and livelihoods. MERECP will address the necessity for effective management of a trans- boundary shared resource in a holistic and participatory manner. MERECP will link environmental management to livelihood security and poverty alleviation as well as conflict resolution.

iati-activity.description: The Lake Victoria Livelihood Program (LVLP) is coordinated by Diakonia and implemented by six faith-based and non governmental organizations in Uganda, Tanzania and Kenya. The overall objective of the programme is to contribute to poverty reduction in the Lake Victoria region within the framework of sustainable development. It has been extended (in a phase-out period) 2011.
